Name: Orphaned Gearhead

Feature.FeatureText: You test Knowledge DR10 when you try to repair a piece of tech or to pilot a vehicle, drone or other machine.

Unit.Name: Semi-autonomous quad-bot
Unit.Description: With tools including a health scanner and torch. Loyal but with an attitude.
Equipped with a camera. 300 M range. Incredibly fragile. An expected corporate espionage tool.
Equipped with a 3D scanner. 300 M range. Incredibly fragile. An expected corporate espionage tool.
Equipped with a heat sensor. 300 M range. Incredibly fragile. An expected corporate espionage tool.

Unit.Name: Prototype crawler drone
Unit.Description: Can follow advanced commands. Needs a hard reboot after dealing max damage.

Vehicle.Description: Five seats and lined with junk. Has a smuggler's hatch underneath it all. Once a day, test Knowledge DR8 to find the spare part you need to fix any broken tech.

Vehicle.Name: Walking weapons platform
Vehicle.Description: Nigh-indestructible, large enough to ride, and janky as hell.

Damage.Name: Anti-material battery
Damage.Description: Destroys most walls, doors, and vehicles with a shot. Has a 2-in-6 chance of breaking down after firing. Takes d4 hours to repair.

ClassLore: People are unreliable. Socially. Physically. Emotionally. Weak bodies and weaker wills. They are worn down, unfixable. Instead, you have mastered emotionless steel and loyal code. You can fix, drive and pilot any machine. Machines, you can trust.

were proclaimed dead. But you know their soul lives on inside something else.
